page.title: 18Jazz Band Gala
page.content: It is a Sunday.I've got a jazz band competition.I'm in the Askern Melody Makers junior jazz band.There are fifty of us between the ages of 9 and 18.There are 4 boys and all the rest are girls.We have to wear a uniform which is red,white and blue.Red hat, blue and red trousers,blue and red top and white trainers.We have all sorts of instruments from maces to drums and kazoos.We don't have our own bus yet but we are saving up for one by holding coffee evenings and sponsored walks.We have to pay to get into a competition and are fined up to Â£40 if we don't turn up.At this competition we are expected to come first.We are quite good.We came second in the world eliminators.We set off at 8 a.m. and get back at 5 p.m. in the afternoon.
